We provide a comprehensive approach, offering strategic guidance and advocacy to protect your financial and personal interests.\r\n\r\nOur firm has earned a reputation for its client-focused approach and high-level legal expertise. We are known for resolving cases through both negotiation and litigation, ensuring favorable outcomes whether through mediation or in court. <!-- wp:acf/intro {"name":"acf/intro","data":{"title":"Get To \u003cspan\u003eKnow Us\u003c/span\u003e","_title":"field_intro_title","short_description":"At New Leaf Family, our compassionate, experienced Colorado family \u0026 divorce lawyers do things differently than most law firms. We know that family disputes can be tough. We believe that they donâ€™t have to break you, but can actually be a chance to turn over your New Leaf and build your life on a better foundation. Our mission is to empower you to make the best decisions for your future self, and your family and use the challenges youâ€™re facing right now as fuel for growth!\r\n\r\nWith years of experience in family law and personal experience with family law issues of our own, weâ€™ve seen how traditional family law firms can get mired in the past and the present, drag things out, pile on unnecessary costs, and leave clients feeling lost and unsupported. Thatâ€™s why we focus on your futureâ€”helping you get clarity about what you want, guiding you through difficult decisions, and providing ongoing support to make sure youâ€™re not just surviving, but thriving!\r\n\r\nWe offer services to clients across the state of Colorado beyond court representation, like coaching and connections to a network of professionals to help you with the next chapter. Plus, our predictable, set-rate monthly billing ensures there are no surprises when it comes to cost.","_short_description":"field_intro_short_description","buttons":"","_buttons":"field_intro_buttons","bottom_tag_line":"","_bottom_tag_line":"field_intro_bottom_tag_line","overlay_layout":"0","_overlay_layout":"field_intro_overlay_layout","flip_layout":"0","_flip_layout":"field_intro_flip_layout","section_background_color":"bg-subtlesand","_section_background_color":"field_intro_section_background_color","background_color":"bg-subtlesand","_background_color":"field_intro_background_color","section_id":"intro-text","_section_id":"field_intro_section_id"},"align":"","mode":"preview"} /-->

<!-- wp:acf/highlights {"name":"acf/highlights","data":{"title":"New Leaf Family \u003cspan\u003eHighlights\u003c/span\u003e","_title":"field_highlights_title","short_description":"","_short_description":"field_highlights_short_description","hightlights_List_0_heading":"Focus on \u003cspan\u003eEmpowering\u003c/span\u003e Our Clients","_hightlights_List_0_heading":"field_highlights_hightlights_list_list_heading","hightlights_List_0_description":"In most family law firms, court and litigation are the focus. What motions need to be filed? What are the deadlines? What are the rules? At New Leaf Family, our focus is on empowering our clients first and foremost. What paperwork needs to be filed at the end is also something we can and do take care of, but in many ways the documentsâ€™ contents are almost irrelevant if our clients donâ€™t really have a firm grasp on what it is they really want, what the alternatives are, and what the best path forward to get there might be.","_hightlights_List_0_description":"field_highlights_hightlights_list_list_description","hightlights_List_1_heading":"\u003cspan\u003eFull Service \u003c/span\u003eOfferings","_hightlights_List_1_heading":"field_highlights_hightlights_list_list_heading","hightlights_List_1_description":"In most law firms, once the court order is signed, thatâ€™s the end of the relationship with the client. In New Leaf Family, we offer many services other than just representation in court. By engaging in these other services many of our clients save themselves not only a great deal of heartache but also a lot of money along the way. These offerings include seminars that help people make difficult decisions, divorce coaching, and a network of professionals such as realtors, financial advisors, auto mechanics, and others to help with the logistics of whatever is coming next for our clients.","_hightlights_List_1_description":"field_highlights_hightlights_list_list_description","hightlights_List_2_heading":"Predictable \u003cspan\u003eSet-Rate Monthly Billing\u003c/span\u003e","_hightlights_List_2_heading":"field_highlights_hightlights_list_list_heading","hightlights_List_2_description":"In most family law firms, court and litigation are the focus. What motions need to be filed? What are the deadlines? What are the rules? At New Leaf Family, our focus is on empowering our clients first and foremost.
